definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: ), v. Kö:ii. 1, 49; Sir 42:12 Hithp. [[הִסְתַּוִּיִד]] (marg. [[הסתיד]]) converse, is perh. denom.; Syr.suwdo0, suwod friendly, confidential speech, o(mili/a, 0estawad = o(milei=n; Sab. [[מסוד]] place of speaker, oracle, Hom:ZMG xlvi (1892), 529, who finds connexion with say=idun lord, chief (and sa0da be be lord), properly speaker; NH = BH).
